revised_title: Contributions to the Normal and Pathological Anatomy of the Lymphatic System of the Lungs
tldr: The author investigates the lymphatic system of the lungs, both in normal and inflamed conditions, and describes the three main systems of lymphatics: subpleural, perivascular, and peribronchial. The study provides insights into the structure and function of these systems and their role in the respiratory process and inflammation.
